channel.description: Recent content in Hands on Labs on

item.title: Designing and Building a Custom VPC from Scratch
item.description: This hands-on lab provides you with some experience building and connecting the following services inside AWS: VPC, subnets, internet gateway, NAT gateways, Bastion host, route tables, security groups, and network access control lists (NACLs). These services are the foundation of networking architecture inside of AWS and cover concepts such as infrastructure, design, routing, and security. Create a VPC Select Your VPCs. Click Create VPC, and set the following values: labVPC 10.
